text: Giza is a city in Egypt. Giza may also refer to: ==People== *Barbara Giza (1550–1589), Polish mistress *Jakub Giża (b. 1985), Polish shot putter *Piotr Giza (b. 1980), Polish footballer ==Places== *Giza Governorate, in Egypt *Giza Peak, a mountain in Antarctica ==Music== *Giza (EP), an extended play by Gatekeeper *Giza Studio, a Japanese record label ==Other uses== *FF Giza, a Faroese football club *5249 Giza, a minor planet ==See also== * *
title: Giza (disambiguation)
